resources.string:
"Universal Mobile Speech Therapy

"
"'An Innovative Advancement to Communicative Technologies'

"
"Features include 30+ words of vocabulary, Speech Progression Timeline, Speech Vowel Recognition, Numerical Acoustic Analysis.

"
"How it Works

" "1.) Choose a word from the menu and pronounce it over a few seconds.

" "2.) Wait for the magic to happen as our application provides you with qualified recommendations to improve your speech!

" "Touch the history button to track your progress!

"
"Our System

" "Utilizing modern clinical research data, we provide our users with extensive numerical studies based on our:

" "Linear Predictive Algorithms

" "Pre-emphasis filters

" "Pre-derived Hamming Window

"
"Guide to understanding our Data

" "Our instant feedback feature describes:

" "Word: Word recognized by our system." "Vowels: Vowels emphasized in grammatical pronunciation of the word." "Gender: Differentiates between various sexes." "F1: Describes the frequency that correlates with wider mouth and lower tongue positioning.

" "F2: Describes the frequency that correlates with extension of the tongue.

" "Rating: Derived from acoustic analysis utlizing statistical dot-plots with the two formants, our application designates a predictive score for proper pronunciation./n/n"
